state.response: ٹیموں کو مربوطی اور مواصلات کو آسان بنانے کے لیے واضح طور پر متعین کردہ کردار، ذمہ داریاں، اصول، اور عمل کی ضرورت ہوتی ہے۔
claims: Teams need clearly defined roles and responsibilities.
Teams need clearly defined rules and processes.
Teams need clearly defined roles to facilitate coordination.
Teams need clearly defined responsibilities to facilitate coordination.
Teams need clearly defined rules to facilitate communication.
Teams need clearly defined processes to facilitate communication.
